It is difficult to know how many other people are in a position
comparable to the one Graydon reveals, but I am apprehensive that
there may be quite a few more. At any rate, I do not think we can
afford any longer to put our heads in the sand. It seems to me that
we have had ample danger signals by now to suggest that we had
better take some immediate steps.
I really think there is cause for grave concern and I would be
grateful for any suggestions as to appropriate steps NAEB might take
in this regard.
Cordially yours,
William G. Harley
